main event: An Air Liner pilot flying from Kodiak to Anchorage reported seeing a bright light object with bluish-green portholes that closed the gap between the aircraft and the object before disappearing.
interesting points: Many similar sightings have been reported by air controllers, meteorologists, passengers and aircraft pilots.
The sightings appear to be becoming more frequent.
The object was described as a bright light with bluish-green portholes.
The object seemed to close the gap between the aircraft and itself before disappearing.
The pilot stated the vehicle was 'definitely unidentified.'
sighted object: a bright light object with bluish-green portholes
